deprecated.description: If true, the field will be deprecated. This means it will not be displayed in forms, but the template will keep it in order to display old entries.

form.description: Defines which form should be automatically used if the red link is clicked

smw_property.description: If set to false, the property will not be saved as a SMW property, through #set or #subobject

sf_form.description: Object, containing SemanticForms option, that will be redirected to the form

showPage.description: If false the field will not be visibly renderd in the page view

showForm.description: If false, the field will not be visible in the form edit view

smw_overwriteOutput.description: Overwrites the final value of the field, used for both display and data set

smw_overwriteOutputToLink.description: If true, this will create a link in display mode, using #formredlink if applicable

smw_overwriteDisplay.description: Overwrites only the display value of the current field

smw_overwriteData.description: Overwrites the final #set or #subobject value of the field. This will also overwrite smw_overwriteOutput.

smw_forceSet.description: Forces the semantic storage of the attribute through the #set parser function. This is useful for #subobject models that want to expose one or more fields as regular #set properties.

smw_arraymaptemplate.description: Name of the arraymap template to use. Field needs to be of type `array`.

smw_drilldown.description: If the global settings `smw_semanticDrilldown` is enabled, fields with smw_drilldown set to true will be filterable.
